a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Prevalence of tuberculosis by drug susceptibility, World, 1990 to
Number of tuberculosis cases by drug susceptibility.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
Note: Multidrug-resistant TB does not respond to at least the two most commonly used drugs against TB - isoniazid and rifampicin.
Extensively drug-resistant TB is resistant to isoniazid, rifampicin, any of the fluoroquinolones and any of the second-line drugs against TB.
